いよいよ体育祭当日ね！\nもう昨日の夜は興奮しすぎて寝れなかったわ。:
It's finally the day of the sports festival!
I was so excited last night that I couldn't sleep.
あはは、なんだか子供の頃みたいだね。: Ahaha, it's like I was a kid.
だってそうじゃない！ 優勝できるって考えると、\n興奮しちゃって仕方なかったもの:
I mean, it's not like that! When I think about how I can win...
I couldn't help but get excited!
ふふ、ジュリーのメンタルならそうだと思ったわ。\n……ところでラウラ、大丈夫？:
Heehee. I knew you'd be able to do that, Julie.
...By the way, Laura, are you okay?
大丈夫か、ラウラ。\n明らかに顔色が悪いんだが。:
Are you all right, Laura?
She's clearly pale.
なかなか寝付けなくて……もし失敗しちゃったら、\nみんなに迷惑をかけたら、なんて:
I couldn't sleep very well... If I failed,
If I start thinking about what would happen if I caused trouble for everyone...
大丈夫！ 今日まであんなに練習してきたんだもん。\n本番ではうまくいくよ！:
Don't worry! I've practiced so much until today.
It'll work out in the real thing!
（ジュリーの言う通りなんだが……ただ、気になるな。\n失敗や迷惑というよりも、も:
(Julie's right, but...I'm just curious.)
It's not so much that it's a failure or a nuisance, but more like there's another way to worry...)
ノエルが自分の衝動をコントロールできるようになって、\nいよいよ４人に死角はない:
Noel had become able to control her own impulses
It was just as the four of them thought there was no blind spot at last.
ラウラは急に調子を落とし、明らかに集中を欠いていた。\nそこからは悪循環で、失敗:
Laura's condition suddenly dropped, and she was clearly out of focus.
From there, it's a vicious cycle, a negative chain where failure leads to even more failures.
大丈夫よ。練習通りにやれば絶対に勝てるわ。: Don't worry. As long as you keep practicing, you'll definitely win.
……うん、そうよね。私、頑張るわ。: ...Yeah, you're right. I'll do my best.
考えすぎないほうがいいんじゃない？\n楽しんでいこ！ だってあたし達が勝つもの！:
Don't you think it's better not to overthink it?
Let's have fun! Because we're going to win!
その通りだな。ジュリーの自信は間違っていない。\n技術や体力じゃない。メンタルが:
You're right. Julie's confidence isn't misplaced.
It's not about technique or stamina. The mental state is at the stage where the results are affected.
ラウラちゃん！ きっと大丈夫だよ！\nあんなにいっぱいみんなで練習してきたからね:
Laura! I'm sure you'll be fine!
We've practiced so much together!
そ、そうよね！ 考えても仕方ないし……！\nよしっ、がんばりましょう！:
Y-You're right! There's no point in thinking about it...!
All right, let's do our best!
おお……思っていた以上に選手の数が多いな。\nプレ・クラスってこんなにチームがあ:
Wow... There are more players than I expected.
I didn't know there were so many teams in Pre-Class.
そうね、幅広い人材を取っているのがこの学園よ。\n正式なパイロットには厳しいけど:
That's right. This academy has a wide range of people.
He's strict with official pilots, but he's that kind.
そうなのよね……メイズ適性さえあるなら、\n意外と入学自体はそこまで敷居は高くな:
That's right... If you even have the aptitude for mace,
The entrance exam itself isn't that high of a threshold.
でも、パイロットに昇格する何かが足りない人も多いわ。\nそういった人たちにチャン:
But there's a lot of people who don't have enough to get promoted to pilot.
It's pre-class to give those people a chance.
中には運が悪かったり、かみ合わせでパイロットになれなかった。\nそんな子も多いわ:
Some of them were unlucky or couldn't become pilots because of their sparring matches.
There are a lot of girls like that. That's why I'm desperate to become a pilot.
なるほどな……だから普通の校舎よりもギラついてるわけだ。\nアピールする絶好の機:
I see... That's why it's more glaring than a normal school building.
Maybe it's because this is the perfect opportunity to show off, but every team has a different look in their eyes.
パイロットに昇格した後で、\n安心できるチームに所属できるチャンスなら眼の色も変:
After I was promoted to pilot,
I guess the color of her eyes would change if this was her chance to join a reassuring team.
そうね！ でも、今回はあたし達が勝つわ！: You're right! But we'll win this time!
だよね！ みんなで昇格しようっ！: You're right! Let's all get promoted!
ねえ、%usernameusernameuserna%。\n本音で言って。私達が:
Hey, %usernameusernameuserna%.
Honestly, what are the odds that we'll win?
お前たちなら絶対に優勝できる！ やってやろう！: You guys will definitely win! Let's do this!
おおーっ、いいね！ %usernameusernameuserna%が\nそう言:
Ohhh, that's great! %usernameusernameuserna% is...
If you say so, there's no doubt about it!
お前たちがかなり上位にいるのは間違いない。\nだが、絶対に勝てる保証はどこにもな:
There's no doubt that you're all at a pretty high rank.
But there's no guarantee we'll win, after all.
うん……絶対なんてないものね。\n: Yeah... There's no way that would happen.
全種目に勝てれば問題はないでしょうけど……\n流石に他のチームの事も考えると現実:
I don't think there'll be any problems if we can win all the events, but...
It's not realistic when you think about the other teams.
でも、５種目で上位を取れば得点で優勝は十分に狙えるわ。: But if you get a high score on the fifth event, you'll be able to aim for victory with plenty of points.
心香、あんまりそういう計算はしなくてもいいぞ。\n今は目の前の競技に集中しておく:
Kokoro, you don't have to do too many calculations like that.
For now, it was better to focus on the competition in front of me.
何かあったら俺がアドバイスをするから任せてくれ。\nそのためのコーチでもあるから:
If anything happens, I'll give you some advice, so leave it to me.
That's why I'm your coach.
……ふふ、ありがとう。そうね。\n%usernameusernameuserna:
...Hehe, thank you. You're right.
I believe in %usernameusernameuserna%.
心香ー！ そろそろ最初の競技よー！\n綱引きだから早くこっちに集まってー！:
Kokoro! It's time for the first competition!
It's a tug-of-war, so hurry up and get over here!
よーし！ ラウラちゃんもいるから、ここは勝たないとね！: All right! Laura's here too, so we've gotta win!
う、うん……そうよね。頑張るわ！: Y-Yeah... You're right. I'll do my best!
それでは綱引きに出場するチームは所定の場所に集合してください。: Now then, please assemble the teams participating in the tug-of-war at the designated location.
ちょうどお呼びがかかったわね。\nみんな、いくわよ！:
I've just been called.
Everyone, let's go!
よし、練習の成果を見せてやれ！: All right, show them the results of your practice!
では、プレ・クラス－Ａとプレ・クラス－Ｂの試合を始めます！\nよーい……スタート:
Now, let's begin the Pre-Class-A and Pre-class-B matches!
All right... Start!!
（綱引きはパワーも重要だが、連携がカギを握る競技だ。\nジュリーたちなら、ここは:
(Power is important in tug-of-war, but coordination is the key to it.)
I'm sure Julie and the others will be able to get here.)
よしっ、いけるわっ！ このまま……: Alright, I can do this! I'll just...
くっ……！？ ちゃんとこっちの隙を狙って来たわね……: Ugh...!? You're looking for an opening here...
（ふむ……相手もしっかりと考えてきているな。\nジュリーたちが緩んだ隙に一気に引:
(Hmm... The other party is thinking about it.)
So the plan is to take advantage of the opportunity Julie and the others have loosened up and pull them all at once?)
（状況観察がシッカリしているな。\nだがジュリーたちには、こういう事も想定して教:
(Your observation of the situation is impeccable.
But I'm teaching Julie and the others, taking this into account.)
これ、教えてもらったやつね！\nよーし、大丈夫よ！ ここを凌げばいいわ！:
This is the one you taught me!
Alright, it's fine! We just have to get through here!
ええ、ここを乗り切れば絶対に勝てるわ。: Yes, if we make it through here, we'll definitely win.
（――っ！？ まずい、タイミングがズレた！！\nいや、まだ大丈夫だ、落ち着いて対:
(――!? This is bad, my timing is off!!)
No, I'm still fine. I just need to calm down and deal with it...!)
（マズい……！ 一番力持ちのラウラの息があってない！\nこうなると、人数の差があ:
(This is bad...! Laura, the most powerful of them all, isn't breathing!
At this point, there's a difference in the number of people, so—)
よーし！ 成功してるよ！ みんな、引いて引いて！: All right! It's a success! Everyone, pull back!
うう……優勝するためには、上位にならないとダメだよね……？: Ugh... In order to win, you have to be at the top, right...?
だ、大丈夫よ！ まあちょっと失敗したけど、\n残りで全部１位になれば問題なしでし:
I-I'm fine! Well, I did mess up a little, but...
If you get first place with the rest, there'll be no problem!
ごめんなさい……！ 私がミスをしちゃって……: I'm sorry...! I made a mistake...
……謝らないで大丈夫。本番だからこそミスは起きるわ。\nこの失敗は忘れて、次で取:
...There's no need to apologize. It's precisely because it's the real deal that mistakes occur.
Let's forget about this failure and make up for it next time.
ああ、心香の言う通りだ。\nこれまでの練習を思い返せば、お前たちなら絶対に勝てる:
Yeah, Shinka's right.
Thinking back on all the practice you've been doing up until now, you guys will definitely win.
（しかし、こんなセリフを心香から聞けるなんて……\n最初に出会った頃からすると感:
(Still, I never thought I'd hear a line like this from Kokoro...)
I've been moved ever since we first met.)
……う、うん……でも、私のせいだから……\n本当にごめんなさい。:
...Y-Yeah... But it's my fault...
I'm really sorry.
あはは、そんなに気にしないでいいよ！\nだってそれで言うなら私の方がいっぱい迷惑:
Ahaha, don't worry about it so much!
Because if that's the case, I caused more trouble than you!
ふふ……それじゃあ切り替えて、次は障害物競走よ。\nあれだけ練習してきたんだから:
Heehee... Let's switch gears, then. Next is the obstacle course.
After all the practice we've been through, we'll definitely win.
……こんな風に心香が励ましてくれるなんて、感動したわ！: ...I'm so moved that you're cheering me up like this!
な、なによ……別に私が言ってもいいでしょ……: Wh-What...? It's fine if I say it...
……うん、心香ちゃんがそう言ってくれるから、\n全力で頑張ろうって思えるわ。:
...Yeah, because Shinka-chan said that,
I think I'll give it my all.
私ができるようになるまで練習したんだもんね！\nだから、絶対に１位を取っちゃおう:
You practiced until I could do it, after all!
So let's definitely win first place!
ああ、お前たちが勝てる事は俺が保証する。\nあの努力があれば絶対に１位を取れるぞ:
Yeah, I guarantee you guys will win.
With that effort, you'll definitely win first place!
